name: Spicy Sausage Casserole
ingredients: 10 ounce can Ro-tel tomatoes, undrained (diced tomatoes with green chiles)
16 ounces frozen cauliflower, cooked and drained

instructions.en: Brown the pork sausage in a large skillet. Drain fat if necessary.
instructions.sk: Opečte bravčovú klobásu na veľkej panvici. V prípade potreby zlejte tuk.
instructions.ja: 大きなフライパンで豚肉ソーセージを炒めます。必要に応じて脂を切ります。

instructions.en: Stir in softened cream cheese until blended.
instructions.sk: Vmiešajte zmäknutý krémový syr, kým sa nespojí.
instructions.ja: 柔らかくしたクリームチーズを加えてよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Add Ro-tel tomatoes to the mixture.
instructions.ja: Ro-telトマトを混ぜ合わせます。

instructions.en: Slightly chop the cooked and drained cauliflower. Mix with the sausage mixture.
instructions.sk: Mierne nasekajte uvarenú a odkvapkanú karfiol. Zmiešajte so zmesou klobásy.
instructions.ja: 調理して水気を切ったカリフラワーを軽く刻みます。ソーセージミックスと混ぜ合わせます。

notes: Makes 6-8 servings. Do not freeze. Good served with a fried egg on top.
